name: Chongle Pan
content: Homepage | The Pan Lab Link Search Menu Expand Document The Pan Lab Homepage Welcome to the Pan LabWe are a group of researchers led by Dr. Chongle Pan in the School of Computer Science and the Department of Microbiology and Plant Biology at the University of Oklahoma. We conduct research projects in the areas of machine learning, microbiology, bioinformatics, biomedical data science, and parallel computing. Our research products include scientific publications, computer software, and machine learning models. Please see our physical labs and our computing resources. Here, we share lab resources, including research protocols, learning materials, and student handbooks.
